channel.title: Notes on Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Thoughts

item.title: Learning R - Rice
item.description: Conclusions Estimated farmer pretax in India of around US$84 per 20 foot container of shipped rough raw rice. That represents a 78% reduction in take home pretax profit since start of 2020 when estimated pretax stood at US$340/container. Despite some increase in price since the start of 2020 farming profitability has fallen sharply. Trigger to enquiry Article in Economic Times of India (accessed: 2020-05-12) that reported today that Basmati rice exporters are suffering from higher shipping costs as a result of lack of containers.
